author: dkotlins
body:
Fix the code in SiPixelInputSources which recognizes dmp data packets.
Header & trailer recognition has to be made mode robust for phase1 FEDs (channels 
go above 36). 
I have modified only 2 files in
IORawData/SiPixelInputSources
src/PixelSLInikDataInputSource.cc and
interface/PixelSLinkDataInputSource.h .
For some reason the pull request lists 188 files. What are they?
title: Fix input sources
